name: Odin
desc: The All-Father in Norse Mythology. Warrior, sorcerer and near insatiable seeker of knowledge, he rides his eight-legged horse Sleipnir, armed with both Gungnir, his mighty spear and Draupnir, an enchanting ring. He is known to have willingly sacrificed an eye to drink from the Well of Wisdom and is also recognized as the one who welcomes the souls of departed warriors as they cross over into Valhalla.
